Pauses or unpauses actors while in Editor mode. 

== Syntax ==
:<code>simulationtype <state: SimulationTypeEnum></code>

== Arguments ==
{{argument|be=1|state: SimulationTypeEnum|enum}}

:* <code>editor</code>
:* <code>game</code>
